description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the Windows Cloud Files Mini Filter Driver information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-30034):

1. Apply the relevant KB updates through Windows Update or manually by downloading from the catalog.
2. Monitor your systems to ensure the updates have been successfully installed.

**Details**:
- The following KB articles address the vulnerability:
  - KB5037771 for Windows 11 Version 23H2.
  - KB5037770 for Windows 11 Version 21H2.
  - KB5037768 for Windows 10 Version 22H2.
- Visit these links for direct download:  
  [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)  
  [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)  
  [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771).
- Ensure that your operating system version matches the stated builds for compatibility.

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that your system is running the correct version of Windows listed above.
- Backup data before applying any updates to avoid potential data loss in case of issues during installation.
